name: 2bullets
description:
Made for the Society of Play Pompous Trash Jam

Made with the HauntedPS1 Render Pipeline

---

As you drift off to sleep, you feel it.

Images flash into your subconscious. From another dreamer. They have found you; dream assassins.

At the brink of death you become an interdimensional gladiator thrust into a deathsport for another chance at life. Trapped in your garbled dreamscape, you must fight through the night to reach the illuminated staircase and bargain for your life. Each door brings you closer.

Tread carefully, you only have...

2 BULLETS

-----CONTROLS

WSAD - move

SPACEBAR - jump

LEFT SHIFT (while moving) - sprint

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON (hold) - aim gun

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON (release) - shoot gun


TIPS
  • Bullets bounce
  • Find the doors
  • You can sprint in-air
  • Detonators will destroy anything caught in their path
  • Watch out for Lurkers, they will relentlessly chase you (I honestly can't remember if they're still in-game)
